title: AIIMS Bhopal Recruitment 2025 - Apply for 02 Project Technical Support- II Posts
description: All India Institute of Medical Sciences Bhopal (AIIMS Bhopal) has announced the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for 02 Project Technical Support Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the 12th Pass, Diploma, DMLT, or Any Degree can grab this chance and apply for the AIIMS Bhopal Recruitment 2025 . Here we include the age limit, Selection Process, Salary Structure, Education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts. If you are looking for more, ...
